description: {"blocks":[{"key":"f8q98","text":"Making mrdA deletion DH5α strain ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":33}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"djvvj","text":" - Amplification of PCR product to replace mrdA sequence in the genome (Kan_VcmrdA fragment amplified from pWW308_VcmrdA plasmid). PCR product has homology with EcmrdA sequence at 5' and 3' ends for homologous recombination. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bdgal","text":"- DH5α strain expressing Lambda Red recombination system proteins from pSIM5 plasmid (introduced into the cells by Heat shock transformation of chemically competent cells - Invitrogen) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9n4fe","text":"-Transform DH5α +  pSIM5 cells with Kan_VcmrdA PCR product to replace mrdA sequence in E. coli genome","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3btkr","text":"Run PCR product on 1% agarose gel","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4julu","text":"50ml 1xTAE + 1μl 10000x GelGreen stock in water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"17vq0","text":"Run 5μl from each PCR reaction","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6jodi","text":"Run 10μl ready to load DNA ladder","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2artm","text":"Run gel at 80V 1 hour","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d203e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cq5p3","text":"DNA purification","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"beqka","text":"Run the rest of the PCR product on agarose gel - 2x 20μl (2 lanes)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"10j4l","text":"DNA band cut from agarose gel and purified by column - Monarch Gel extraction kit","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"589ag","text":"[use the B-BOX™ Blue Light LED Epi-illuminator to cut the DNA band from the agarose gel]","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8bbal","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e7smh","text":"Monarch DNA gel extraction kit (NEB)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":31},{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":36}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"g9fp","text":"- Purification of up to 5μg dsDNA from agarose gels","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7dpl3","text":"- Add 4 volumes of gel dissolving buffer (100mg agarose band (100μl) + 400μl buffer)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9bq42","text":"- Each column can take 800μl","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ddrlj","text":"- Add ethanol to the wash buffer before using","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ch8mr","text":"- Centrifugations at 16000xg RT [Max speed for our benchtop centrifuge is 15000xg]","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"82fn1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2ml0c","text":"a. Add 400μl gel dissolving buffer to the 1.5ml eppendorf tube with the agarose gel band (100mg)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a0ek3","text":"b. Incubate in thermomixer at 50°C, 500rpm, for a few minutes until the agarose is completely dissolved (~10minutes)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cu4mo","text":"c. Transfer to the column","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"51rul","text":"d. Spin 15000xg 1minute","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"34hn5","text":"e. Discard flow-through","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"89fqf","text":"f. Add 200μl wash buffer (with ethanol)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"asp06","text":"g. Spin 1 minute 15000xg","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"clq2l","text":"h. Discard flow-through","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5538k","text":"i. Repeat the wash with 200μl wash buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eqprk","text":"j. Spin as before and discard flow-through","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"77var","text":"k. Spin extra 1 minute 15000xg [extra step not in the protocol, to make sure there is no ethanol left in the column]","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8o17g","text":"l. Transfer column to new 1.5ml eppendorf (not supplied)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9se6a","text":"m. Add 10μl elution buffer and incubate 1 minute RT","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2p10d","text":"n. Spin 15000xg 1 min to elute the DNA","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6lvu7","text":"Mix the purified PCR product from the 2 columns","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eraf1","text":"DNA stored at +4°C [Purified PCR product eluted in 20μl elution buffer (TE)] until ready to use ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7lr5i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4qkic","text":"DNA quantification","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9cs6m","text":"Run 1μl and 3μl purified PCR product on 1% agarose gel (step 8.)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6lr3j","text":"Check if the PCR fragment is correct and ~ DNA concentration","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2bi1e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"gucs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Transform strain eCR106 cells with purified PCR fragment
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"abmmr","text":"Streak strain eCR106 onto LB /Chlr20 agar plate and incubate at 30°C for ~ 24hours","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5aic","text":"Inoculate LB/chlor20 with 1 colony from strain eCR106","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"31v9n","text":"Incubate the culture O/N at 30°C shaking 180rpm","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6pnfo","text":"Check OD of the O/N culture and inoculate 2x50ml fresh LB with O/N culture to get a starting OD of ~0.03-0.05 (250ml erlenmeyer)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cu4ck","text":"No antibiotics added to the cultures","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"64h3d","text":"Grow the cells at 30°C 180rpm until OD ~0.4-0.5","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fpu08","text":"Takes ~ 4 hours for the cells to reach the correct density","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fhskm","text":"Mix the 2 cultures and then transfer half of the volume to 42°C 15 minutes (for Red protein induction)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"araks","text":"Red protein induction in Sous Vide water bath - keep mixing the cells for the 15 minutes ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b8eo3","text":"Keep the other half of the culture at 30°C 180rpm (control: non-induced cells)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3pp4r","text":"Transfer the induced and non-induced cultures to cold 50ml falcon tubes and incubate on ice for ~10 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"55int","text":"Centrifuge at 3000xg 10 minutes at 4°C to pellet the cells","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8a4ip","text":"Wash cells with 25ml ice-cold water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8g4dr","text":"Resuspend pellet with 1ml ice-cold water. Add the rest of the volume to the tube and gently mix the cells","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5o1dt","text":"Centrifuge at 3000xg 10 minutes at 4°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6sk6i","text":"Wash cells with 15ml ice-cold water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e5smp","text":"Resuspend pellet with 1ml ice-cold water. Add the rest of the volume to the tube and gently mix the cells","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9su6h","text":"Centrifuge at 3000xg 10 minutes at 4°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ot9i","text":"Resuspend the cells in 200μl ice-cold 10% glycerol solution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8h37a","text":"Aliquot 20μl cells for electroporation in 1.5ml eppendorf tubes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"n4a4","text":"Add ~ 100ng purified PCR product (~2μl) to 20μl electrocompetent cells in an 1.5ml eppendorf tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"40g4a","text":"Keep the cells on ice","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"353d7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9efgr","text":"Transform induced and non-induced cells with PCR product","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"575qg","text":"1.
